JobFullDesc: ManagerDocument Review ServicesRegulatory & Legal SupportReady for an exciting and fast-paced career? Have a passion for turning business issues into opportunities for growth, resilience and long-term advantage? As a Regulatory & Legal Support Manager at Deloitte, you will have the opportunity to address our clients' needs to manage regulatory compliance, enforcement actions, litigations, disputes, financial crime, and other investigation-related matters. You will anticipate emerging threats through the use of market-leading technology to uncover possibilities that others may fail to find, and ultimately help clients turn business issues into successful opportunities.Work you'll doDeloitte's managed review team assists organizations and their legal counsel by helping to improve the overall document review process. Our focus is on streamlining the review, improving accuracy, and creating cost savings through leading practices and workflows such as pre-and post-processing data culling, the use of predictive coding and other analytics, and providing real-time reporting.In addition, as part of managed review, our experienced team of attorneys and analytics professionals will provide consultative support to outside counsel regarding quality control workflows, privilege logs, document chronologies and synopses, and assistance with deposition and trial preparation.A Document Review Manager will oversee the day-to-day activities on client engagements, including supervising and assisting in the training and mentoring of Consultants and Senior Consultants. Responsibilities include designing the scope of work for various engagements while compiling, analyzing, and documenting facts for matters under investigation, currently in litigation, or in response to regulatory matters. Managers will develop implementation plans, provide recommendations to clients and counsel, and define resource requirements and project budgets. Managers are also responsible for billing and collections, maintaining client relationships and ensuring client satisfaction. Managers will participate in drafting RFP responses, engagement letters and Statements of Work, and will attend industry conferences and tradeshows and develop initiatives to improve capabilities of the practice.
